data.current_description: Return the settings for a video conference application with the specified ID.
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves the external settings configuration for a video conferencing application identified by the appId. Returns an ExternalSettings object containing the URLs for various video conferencing actions (meeting creation, joining, etc.). Requires valid appId parameter. Returns 404 if the application settings are not found.

data.current_description: Updates the settings for a video conference application with the specified ID.
data.description_suggestion: Updates or creates the external settings configuration for a video conferencing application identified by appId. Accepts an ExternalSettings object containing HTTPS URLs for video conferencing actions. This is a full replacement operation - all ExternalSettings properties must be provided. Returns the updated ExternalSettings object. Replaces any previously stored settings for the specified appId.
data.reasoning: Original summary lacks domain specificity. message: Operation 'delete-/crm/v3/extensions/videoconferencing/settings/{appId}_archive' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects, inconsistent_terminology, poor_ai_interpretability. Original summary 'Delete settings' is too generic. Enhanced version clarifies the destructive nature, side effects on HubSpot integration, and expected response code for better AI agent understanding of operation consequences.

data.current_description: Deletes the settings for a video conference application with the specified ID.
data.description_suggestion: Removes the external settings configuration for a video conferencing application identified by appId. This operation permanently deletes all stored settings (URLs and configuration) for the specified application. After deletion, the application will no longer be able to provide video conferencing links in HubSpot meeting requests until new settings are configured. Returns a 204 No Content response on successful deletion.
data.reasoning: Original summary 'Delete settings' is too generic. Description lacks critical details about what is deleted (external settings/URLs), the permanence of the action, and the impact on functionality (no video conferencing links until reconfigured). Enhanced version clarifies the destructive nature, side effects on HubSpot integration, and expected response code for better AI agent understanding of operation consequences.
